2.11. Extensions 15
4. Regression vs. Classiﬁcation : Are you working on a regression or classiﬁcation
predictive modeling problem? What are some alternate ways to frame your time series
forecasting problem?
5. Univariate vs. Multivariate : Are you working on a univariate or multivariate time
series problem?
6. Single-step vs. Multi-step : Do you require a single-step or a multi-step forecast?
7. Static vs. Dynamic : Do you require a static or a dynamically updated model?
